label: 三角縁神獣鏡
本: The Emergence of Japanese Kingship . Stanford University Press . 1997
見出し読み: さんかくぶちしんじゅきょう
説明文: a cast bronze mirror decorated with a triangular rim and images of deities and beasts. Such mirrors are associated with those presented as gifts to Queen Himiko of Yamatai in the third century by emissaries of the Chinese Wei dynasty Son of Heaven.　[卑弥呼]
